text: Devastating when it lands, ineffective if it misses.
Visited by a green dragon whilst forging this lethal glaive, its maker believes the creature itself was incorporated into the steel.
Lü Bu and his favoured weapon fight as if they were one.
The perfect weight and fit, tailored for this warrior of class and distinction.
